column4: I've been using Ubuntu for four years now. I'm finding this new release harder to use. You have to search for programs?
I know Im going to get flamed for this but wtf.... use a distro that suits you
go to hell! I'm just saying how I feel. I've been using Ubuntu for four years now, and don't plan on changing. But I don't think it's a reason to take a step backwards
this chat is probably the most helpful place. Idiots like you were never tolerated
